message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $850000. I'm willing to come down to $920000, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that works for you!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $880000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not quite ready to give up on getting closer to my initial price. I'll come down to $915000, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if you're ready to make a deal!
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I understand your position, and I am willing to consider a price of $895000. I hope this proposal is within your range.

I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $900000, but that's my final offer. I've already given you a significant discount from my initial price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. Let me know if this is the price you're willing to pay!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I am willing to pay $890000 for the product. This is my final offer, as I believe this price is fair given the value I see in the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $900000. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 6-month warranty and a dedicated support package, which is a $20000 value, absolutely free. If you're still interested, I'll sell it to you for $900000. That's my final offer!
